TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 标识以视觉样式绘制的控件或用户界面 (UI) 元素。

span.span: Identifies a control or user interface (UI) element that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类标识由操作系统当前视觉样式定义的 Windows 控件或用户界面 (UI) 元素。The class identifies a Windows control or user interface (UI) element that is defined by the current visual style of the operating system. 视觉样式元素定义的*类*，*一部分*，并*状态*:A visual style element is defined in terms of *class*, *part*, and *state*: - *类*标识一组通常一起绘制的相关的视觉样式元素。The *class* identifies a group of related visual style elements that are typically drawn together. 通过指定的类属性。The class is specified by the property. - *一部分*定义了类的一个离散成员。The *part* defines a discrete member of a class. 通过指定部分属性。The part is specified by the property. - *状态*描述由类和部件定义的元素的当前视觉状态。The *state* describes the current visual state of the element defined by the class and part. 通过指定状态属性。The state is specified by the property. 命名空间公开了数百个对象表示的控件和用户界面可以定义的视觉样式元素。The namespace exposes hundreds of objects that represent the controls and user interface elements that can be defined by a visual style. 这些对象作为公开`static`属性的嵌套类的。These objects are exposed as `static` properties of nested classes of . 每个属性所属的类的限定的名称表示类，绘制元素的部分和属性名称表示的元素的状态。For each property, the qualified name of the owning class represents the class and the part of the drawn element, and the property name represents the state of the element. 例如，属性返回可用于在按下状态以视觉样式绘制一个按钮。For example, the property returns a that can be used to draw a button in the pressed state with visual styles. `Pressed`属性名称对应于状态`PushButton`对应于部分，和`Button`标识视觉样式元素的类。The `Pressed` property name corresponds to the state, `PushButton` corresponds to the part, and `Button` identifies the class of the visual style element. 若要绘制的视觉样式元素，创建，将其设置为你想要绘制，然后再调用方法。To draw a visual style element, create a , set it to the you wish to draw, and then call the method. 若要确定当前视觉样式是否提供了特定元素的定义，请调用元素作为参数的方法。To determine whether the current visual style provides a definition for a particular element, call the method with the element as the argument. 和包装从 Windows Platform SDK 的 Windows Shell 部分的视觉样式 API 的功能。 and wrap the functionality of the visual styles API from the Windows Shell portion of the Windows Platform SDK. 视觉样式的详细信息，请参阅"使用 Windows XP 视觉样式"上的 MSDN Library 的 Platform SDK 部分中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)。For more information on visual styles, see "Using Windows XP Visual Styles" in the Platform SDK portion of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个完整的应用程序，用于浏览和绘制的所有提供的用户界面对象公开的命名空间。The following code example is a complete application that provides a UI for browsing and drawing all of the objects exposed by the namespace. 若要查看某个元素，请使用左侧和右侧的窗口导航到表示要绘制，然后单击的节点的元素的状态的节点上的控件。To view an element, use the control on the left side of the window to navigate to the node that represents the state of the element you want to draw, and then click the node. 此示例将仅当该元素定义由当前视觉样式绘制所选的元素。This sample will draw the selected element only if the element is defined by the current visual style. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取此 表示的视觉样式元素的类名。

span.span: Gets the class name of the visual style element that this represents.

value.span: 一个表示视觉样式元素的类名的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the class name of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类名称引用的一组通常一起绘制的相关的视觉样式元素。A class name refers to a group of related visual style elements that are typically drawn together. 类名可对应于一个控件，例如"滚动条"和"跟踪条"，但还可以对一组不对应于特定的控件，如"EXPLORERBAR"和"STARTPANEL"的元素引用的类名称。A class name can correspond to a control, such as "SCROLLBAR" and "TRACKBAR", but a class name can also refer to a group of elements that do not correspond to a particular control, such as "EXPLORERBAR" and "STARTPANEL". 视觉样式类、 部件和状态的详细信息，请参阅"部件和状态"中的 Windows Shell 文档[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information on visual style classes, parts, and states, see "Parts and States" in the Windows Shell documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此 表示的视觉样式元素的部件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the part of the visual style element that this represents.

value.span: 一个表示视觉样式元素的部件的值。

span.span: A value that represents the part of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部件是类的离散的视觉样式元素的成员。A part is a discrete member of a class of visual style elements. 例如，表示复选框、 单选按钮和下压按钮的视觉样式元素是"按钮"类的所有被视为的部分。For example, visual style elements that represent a check box, radio button, and push button are all considered parts of the "BUTTON" class. 部分值都是整数，介于 1 和为特定的类定义的部分数。Part values are integers that range from 1 to the number of parts defined for a particular class. 视觉样式类、 部件和状态的详细信息，请参阅"部件和状态"中的 Windows Shell 文档[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information on visual style classes, parts, and states, see "Parts and States" in the Windows Shell documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此 表示的视觉样式元素的状态。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the state of the visual style element that this represents.

value.span: 一个表示视觉样式元素的状态的值。

span.span: A value that represents the state of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视觉样式部件可以具有一个或多个可视状态。A visual style part can have one or more visual states. 例如，在已禁用、 选中或取消选中状态可以是表示单选按钮的视觉样式元素。For example, a visual style element that represents a radio button can be in the disabled, checked, or unchecked state. 状态值为介于 1 和为特定的部件定义的状态数的整数。State values are integers that range from 1 to the number of states defined for a particular part. 视觉样式类、 部件和状态的详细信息，请参阅"部件和状态"中的 Windows Shell 文档位于[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information on visual style classes, parts, and states, see "Parts and States" in the Windows Shell documentation located at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
